name: vImage_YpCbCrPixelRange
desc: Range and clamping information for Y'CbCr pixel formats.

items.name: init(Yp_bias: Int32, CbCr_bias: Int32, YpRangeMax: Int32, CbCrRangeMax: Int32, YpMax: Int32, YpMin: Int32, CbCrMax: Int32, CbCrMin: Int32)
items.desc: Returns a structure describing range and clamping information for Y'CbCr pixel formats.

items.name: var Yp_bias: Int32
items.desc: The encoding for Y' = 0.0 for this video format (varies by bit depth).

items.name: var CbCr_bias: Int32
items.desc: The encoding for {Cb, Cr} = 0.0 for this video format.

items.name: var YpRangeMax: Int32
items.desc: The encoding for Y' = 1.0 for this video format.

items.name: var CbCrRangeMax: Int32
items.desc: The encoding for {Cb, Cr} = 0.5 for this video format.

items.name: var YpMax: Int32
items.desc: The encoding for the maximum allowed Y' value.

items.name: var YpMin: Int32
items.desc: The encoding of the minimum allowed Y' value.

items.name: var CbCrMax: Int32
items.desc: The encoding of the maximum allowed {Cb, Cr} value.

items.name: var CbCrMin: Int32
items.desc: The encoding of the minimum allowed {Cb, Cr} value.
